additionalTextInformation.text:
According to the entry in Koller’s auction catalogue there is a very similar version of this painting in Schloss Gottorf [DE_SHLM_NONE-001] dated '1525'. Moreover it also suggests that if the overpaint detected around the signature and the date is taken into consideration it is possible that the date on this painting may also have originally read ‘1525 rather than '1528'. The entry also lists a further 4 versions, including two with text, one in a private collection [PRIVATE_NONE-P244], the other in Huis Bergh, Holland [NL_SSHBH_43]. The remaining two are without text, one in the Barnes Foundation, USA [US_BFP_BF867] and the other formerly in Blankenburg Castle in the Harz.
[See online database Koller Auktionen, accessed 01.10.2020](https://www.kollerauktionen.ch/de/335153-0214-1188-LUCAS-CRANACH-D.-Ae.-UND-WERKST-1188_462197.html?RecPos=3)

historicEventInformations.remarks: 'during a previous restauration campaign the figure '5' was changed to an '8'' [Online database Koller Auktionen, accessed 01.10.2020](https://www.kollerauktionen.ch/de/335153-0214-1188-LUCAS-CRANACH-D.-Ae.-UND-WERKST-1188_462197.html?RecPos=3)

dating.remarks: [dated, the figure '5' may have been changed to an '8' during a previous restoration campaign]

pageContext.description:
A bust-length portrait of Friedrich the Wise in three quarter profile against a neutral background, facing to his left. The elector is wearing a fur-trimmed black cloak over a white pleated shirt. His black beret is placed at an angle on his head. 
[cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support:  38.7 x 25.3 cm
[Online database Koller Auktionen, accessed 01.10.2020](https://www.kollerauktionen.ch/de/335153-0214-1188-LUCAS-CRANACH-D.-Ae.-UND-WERKST-1188_462197.html?RecPos=3)
pageContext.inscription:
- on paper pasted on to the lower third of the panel (recto): 
the text is no longer legible

Painting on beech wood

pageContext.provenance:
- private collection, Binningen near Basel, 1974
- by inheritance, Swiss private collection
- sold at the auction house Koller, Switzerland, 29.03.2019, lot 3007
[Online database Koller Auktionen, accessed 01.10.2020](https://www.kollerauktionen.ch/de/335153-0214-1188-LUCAS-CRANACH-D.-Ae.-UND-WERKST-1188_462197.html?RecPos=3)

tests.text: The infrared reflectogram shows an underdrawing similar to that found on other paintings firmly attributed to Cranach or his workshop.[Online database Koller Auktionen: https://www.kollerauktionen.ch/de/335153-0214-1188-LUCAS-CRANACH-D.-Ae.-UND-WERKST-1188_462197.html?RecPos=3; accessed 01.10.2020]

pageContext.signature: Artist's insignia at the left above the sitter's proper right shoulder: serpent with elevated wings, facing right and dated '152[8]'; in black paint (evidence of retouching, suggests this date should read '1525')

titles.title: Portrait of Elector Friedrich III, called 'the Wise'
